prerequisite: Any arcane class, at least two illusion at-will or encounter powers
name: Battleweaver
text: You have adapted your arcane talents to control the field of battle. Your tradition originated with gnomes of the Feydark, who escaped their fomorian masters by mastering shadow magic to make their innate talent for illusions even more potent. Like those gnomes, you are an illusionist at heart, building your tactics on deception and misdirection. The shadowstuff you infuse into your spells makes those illusions a tangible part of the battlefield.

features.hinderingIllusion(11thLevel): Whenever you hit a creature with an at-will illusion attack power, the creature is slowed until the end of your next turn
features.weaver'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to use an illusion attack power, you have combat advantage against each target of the power
features.illusoryShelter(12thLevel): You gain the illusory shelter power
features.pierceIllusion(16thLevel): Any enemy takes a -2 penalty to its first saving throw against the effects of your illusion powers
features.reshapeBattlefield(20thLevel): You gain the reshape battlefield power
